review: The stick is great for us. Was very easy to install and user friendly.
author: krista turner

review: Our only problem with it is that we don't seem to have enough time to watch all we want to.  But we are trying.  And will continue to
author: Patricia A. Nelson

review: Really nice product, shame it doesn't support other streaming services like Roku (Google, Vudu, etc.) but amazon's a business so can't fault them for that
author: nihn

review: I love this! I have apple TV and the Fire stick runs seamlessly compared to our appleTv. I'm really happy I purchased this- especially for the PrimeTv!!! Thank you for another amazing product!
author: Dannika M. Wooster "DanniWoo"

review: I've been using Chromecast.. but ever since I got the Fire TV stick.. I no longer touch the Chromecast.. You have so many other options with the Amazon Fire tv stick.. I can use both Netflix and Amazon Prime and so much more. Best and great investment..
author: KP84

review: Cable is almost out of here!
author: C. B. Griffin "CBG"

review: Works very good; easy to set up.
author: Jake Blythe

review: Love this firestick.  I'm technologically impaired and could still figure it out. Would recommend for anyone who wants streaming but doesn't have a smart tv.
author: Anitra

review: Exactly what I expected, works great
author: Denise Zielinski
